mapper.select: SELECT empno, ename, job FROM emp
SELECT ename FROM emp Where empno = #{empNo}
SELECT ename, job FROM emp where ename like "%L%L%"
select ename, comm from emp where comm is null
select ename, hiredate from emp where HIREDATE > '1980-12-17' and HIREDATE < '1982-01-23'
select ename from emp where job = #{jobName} and sal > #{sal}
select ename, sal from emp where (DEPTNO = 10 or DEPTNO = 30) and sal > #{sal}
select ename, job, sal from emp where mgr is null
select ename, job, hiredate, sal from emp where date_format(hiredate, '%Y') = #{year}
select ename, sal from emp where date_format(hiredate, '%m') = #{month}
select ename, hiredate, sal from emp where job = #{jobName} limit 1
